sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.PHOTOS_NEWS_ID photosNewsID, b.PHOTO_URL photoURL, b.PHOTO_DESC photoDesc, PHOTO_ID photoID, A.PHOTOS_NEWS_TITLE photoTitle, a.IS_TEXT_NEWS isTextNews, trim(A.PROGRAM_TYPE) programType FROM traffic_Photos_News_T a JOIN TRAFFIC_PHOTO_INFO_T b ON a.PHOTOS_NEWS_ID = b.PHOTOS_NEWS_ID AND b.IS_MAIN_PHOTO = '1' AND a.PHOTOS_NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND a.IS_DEL = '0' AND b.IS_DEL = '0' AND a.PROGRAM_TYPE = '010101' LEFT JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t c ON A.PHOTOS_NEWS_ID = C.NEWS_ID WHERE (C.PRESS_DATE <= SYSDATE OR c.PRESS_DATE IS NULL) ORDER BY a.ENTRY_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, b.news_title newsTitle, b.section_postion sectionPosition FROM TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T a JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t b ON a.news_id = b.news_id AND b.news_part_tag = 1 AND a.is_del = 0 AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.page_id = '010101' AND b.NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND B.SECTION_POSTION = 2 and (b.PRESS_DATE<=sysdate or b.PRESS_DATE is null) ORDER BY b.PRESS_DATE DESC NULLS last,b.ENTRY_DATE desc NULLS last) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, b.news_title newsTitle, b.section_postion sectionPosition FROM TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T a JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t b ON a.news_id = b.news_id AND b.news_part_tag = 1 AND a.is_del = 0 AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.page_id = '010101' AND b.NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND B.SECTION_POSTION = 3 and (b.PRESS_DATE<=sysdate or b.PRESS_DATE is null) ORDER BY b.PRESS_DATE DESC NULLS last,b.ENTRY_DATE desc NULLS last) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, b.news_title newsTitle, b.section_postion sectionPosition FROM TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T a JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t b ON a.news_id = b.news_id AND b.news_part_tag = 1 AND a.is_del = 0 AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.page_id = '010101' AND b.NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND B.SECTION_POSTION = 4 and (b.PRESS_DATE<=sysdate or b.PRESS_DATE is null) ORDER BY b.STICK_STATE desc nulls last,b.PRESS_DATE DESC NULLS last,b.ENTRY_DATE desc NULLS last) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, b.news_title newsTitle, b.section_postion sectionPosition FROM TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T a JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t b ON a.news_id = b.news_id AND b.news_part_tag = 1 AND a.is_del = 0 AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.page_id = '01010902' AND b.NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND B.SECTION_POSTION = 2 and (b.PRESS_DATE<=sysdate or b.PRESS_DATE is null) ORDER BY b.PRESS_DATE DESC NULLS last,b.ENTRY_DATE desc NULLS last) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, b.news_title newsTitle, b.section_postion sectionPosition FROM TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T a JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t b ON a.news_id = b.news_id AND b.news_part_tag = 1 AND a.is_del = 0 AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.page_id = '01010902' AND b.NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND B.SECTION_POSTION = 3 and (b.PRESS_DATE<=sysdate or b.PRESS_DATE is null) ORDER BY b.PRESS_DATE DESC NULLS last,b.ENTRY_DATE desc NULLS last) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.news_id newsID, b.news_title newsTitle, b.section_postion sectionPosition FROM TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T a JOIN traffic_text_news_info_t b ON a.news_id = b.news_id AND b.news_part_tag = 1 AND a.is_del = 0 AND b.is_del = '0' AND a.page_id = '01010902' AND b.NEWS_STATUS = 7 AND B.SECTION_POSTION = 4 and (b.PRESS_DATE<=sysdate or b.PRESS_DATE is null) ORDER BY b.STICK_STATE desc nulls last,b.PRESS_DATE DESC NULLS last,b.ENTRY_DATE desc NULLS last) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.magazine_id magazineID, A.MAGAZINE_TITLE magazineTitle, A.MAGAZINE_NUMBER magazineNum, A.MAIN_PHOTOS_URL photoURL FROM TRAFFIC_MAGAZINE_INFO_T a WHERE A.IS_DEL = '0' AND MAGAZINE_STATUS = 7 ORDER BY TO_DATE (MAGAZINE_NUMBER, 'yyyy/mm') DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VIDEO_NEWS_ID videoNewsId, VIDEO_NEWS_NAME videoNewsName, MAIN_PHOTOS_URL mainPhotosUrl, VIDEO_URL videoUrl FROM TRAFFIC_VIDEO_NEWS_T WHERE IS_DEL = '0' AND VIDEO_NEWS_STATUS = 7 ORDER BY entry_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT OPTION_ID, OPTION_TITLE FROM TRAFFIC_OPTION_COLLECT_T WHERE option_status = 7 AND is_del = 0 ORDER BY VALID_DATE_S DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM SURVEY_QUESTIONAIRE WHERE SHOW_ON_INDEX = 1 AND IS_DEL = 0 ORDER BY QTE_EXPIRES DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select c.news_id newsID, a.News_Title newsTitle, to_char(a.entry_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') entryDate, a.entry_user entryuser, a.News_Status newsStatusID, b.info_name newsStatusName, a.APPROVALER approvaler, c.PAGE_ID programType, c.IS_FIRST isFirst from TRAFFIC_PAGE_NEWS_REF_T c join Traffic_Text_News_Info_T a on c.news_id = a.NEWS_ID and c.is_del = '0' join Traffic_Base_Info_T b on a.News_Status = b.Info_ID and b.is_del = '0' and a.is_del = '0' where a.News_Part_Tag = '1' and c.page_id =#programType# and a.News_Status=7 and rownum <11
